content: 想让在 **结果区渲染 res**, 就需要最后一行是  <u>a = res 或 res = ...</u>

res=0
for i in range(101):
    res+=i
a=res

<svg width="736" height="100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- 宣纸底色背景 -->
  <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="#F8F3E6" rx="8" ry="8"/>

  <!-- 定义胭脂红渐变 -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="yanzhi" x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="1">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#C2356D"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#B33F5A"/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>

  <!-- 居中文字 -->
  <text 
    x="368" 
    y="50" 
    font-family="'Ma Shan Zheng', 'STXingkai', 'KaiTi', serif" 
    font-size="28"
    fill="url(#yanzhi)"
    text-anchor="middle"
    dominant-baseline="middle"
    letter-spacing="2"
  >
    HighDream
  </text>
</svg>
